abstracts.cdata!:
Project outcome is rated satisfactory
            overall, while sustainability is likely. World Bank
            performance is adjudged to be highly satisfactory while
            Borrower performance is satisfactory. The list of lessons
            learned include the following: Termination of Consulting
            services for project management should be available to the
            PMU until all civil works have been fully completed, tested,
            and commissioned to ensure that Bank funding and assistance
            is available in the case of failures during any of these
            events. The Cambodian electricity company (EDC) was left
            alone to bring up claims of incomplete works and equipment
            breakdown to the Contractor. Resolution of these issues has
            burdened EDC staff time and resources. Current Bank
            procurement practices regarding conflict of interest could
            interfere with efficient project implementation in that
            mandatory selection of different consulting firms for
            preparation and supervision reduces ownership of bidding
            documents and continuity in project management.
            Collaboration between the Borrower and the Implementing
            Agency is more effective when there is open communication
            and clear understanding of the different roles of each,
            particularly at the senior management level. When selecting
            turn-key contracts types, attention should be given to the
            implementation capacity and technology needs of the
            implementing agency. Implementation of a land acquisition
            program needs a firm compensation policy that applies
            uniform standards of compensation.
